text: Despite looking super loved up at the Academy of Country Music Awards last week, Nicole Kidman and Keith Urban's marriage is still under the microscope following multiple reports their marriage is on the rocks. Now it's being claimed that Keith has given his famous wife an ultimatum, reportedly telling her to cut back on her heavy workload or their marriage is over. ` ` He really wants her to take time off so they can spend more time together as a family,'' an insider told NW magazine. ` ` He knows they can get back to where they were if they work at it.''
